snippet.title: KLONOA Phantasy Reverie Series – Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Where do dreams go? 💭

Venture through Klonoa: Door to Phantomile and Klonoa 2: Lunatea’s Veil to try and find out! 

KLONOA Phantasy Reverie Series is out TODAY on all platforms along with a demo: http://spr.ly/6055zolqH

Plus, get cool costume changes, access to a digital artbook, and soundtrack app with the Special Bundle DLC!
